pageInfo.title: Accessibility - Zion
pageInfo.description: Zion's accessibility features and commitment to making our AI-powered marketplace accessible to all users.
pageInfo.content: ZionMarketplaceAboutContactAccessibility at ZionWe are committed to making our AI-powered marketplace accessible to all users, regardless of their abilities or disabilities.Our CommitmentZion is dedicated to ensuring that our platform is accessible to everyone. We believe that technology should be inclusive and that everyone should have equal access to the opportunities our marketplace provides.We continuously work to improve accessibility and welcome feedback from our users to help us make our platform better for everyone.Accessibility FeaturesVisual Accessibility• High contrast color schemes• Adjustable font sizes• Clear typography and spacing• Alternative text for images• Focus indicators for navigationAudio Accessibility• Screen reader compatibility• Audio descriptions for content• Caption support for videos• Voice navigation options• Audio feedback for interactionsMotor Accessibility• Keyboard navigation support• Voice control compatibility• Large click targets• Customizable input methods• Gesture alternativesMobile Accessibility• Responsive design• Touch-friendly interfaces• Mobile screen reader support• Gesture alternatives• Optimized for mobile devicesCognitive Accessibility• Clear and simple language• Consistent navigation• Predictable layouts• Error prevention• Help and guidance featuresLanguage Accessibility• Multi-language support• Translation services• Cultural considerations• Localized content• Language preferencesStandards ComplianceWCAG 2.1 ComplianceWe strive to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards, which include:• Perceivable content and interface• Operable navigation and functionality• Understandable information and operation• Robust compatibility with assistive technologiesAdditional Standards• Section 508 compliance• ADA Title III compliance• EN 301 549 accessibility• ISO 9241-171 ergonomics• Local accessibility regulationsAssistive Technology SupportScreen Readers• JAWS (Windows)• NVDA (Windows)• VoiceOver (macOS/iOS)• TalkBack (Android)• Orca (Linux)Other Assistive Tools• Voice recognition software• Switch navigation devices• Eye tracking systems• Magnification software• Alternative input devicesTesting and FeedbackOur Testing Process• Automated accessibility testing• Manual testing with assistive technologies• User testing with people with disabilities• Regular accessibility audits• Continuous monitoring and improvementYour FeedbackWe welcome feedback on accessibility issues and suggestions for improvement.Contact us about accessibility →Accessibility ResourcesFor Users• Accessibility user guide• Keyboard shortcuts• Screen reader tutorials• Accessibility settings• Troubleshooting guideFor Developers• Accessibility development guidelines• Testing tools and resources• Best practices documentation• Compliance checklists• Training materialsNeed Help with Accessibility?Our team is here to help ensure you have the best possible experience on our platform.Contact SupportHelp
